entry.title: Template: TokoKita
entry.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <!DOCTYPE html> <html b:css='false' b:defaultwidgetversion='2' b:layoutsVersion='3' b:responsive='true' b:templateVersion='1.0.0' expr:class='data:blog.languageDirection' expr:dir='data:blog.languageDirection' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml' xmlns:b='http://www.google.com/2005/gml/b' xmlns:data='http://www.google.com/2005/gml/data' xmlns:expr='http://www.google.com/2005/gml/expr'> <head> <b:if cond='data:blog.url == data:blog.homepageUrl'> <title><data:blog.title/></title> <meta expr:content='data:blog.title' itemprop='name'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.title' name='twitter:title'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.title' name='twitter:image:alt'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.title' property='og:image:alt'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.title' property='og:title'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.title' property='og:site_name'/> <!-- Keywords --> <meta expr:content='data:blog.title' name='keywords'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.title' property='article:tag'/> <b:else/> <b:if cond='data:blog.pageType == "index"'> <b:if cond='data:blog.searchLabel'> <title><data:blog.pageName/> - <data:blog.title/></title> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' itemprop='name'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:title'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:image:alt'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' property='og:image:alt'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' property='og:title'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.title' property='og:site_name'/> <!-- Keywords --> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + ", " + data:blog.title' name='keywords'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + ", " + data:blog.title' property='article:tag'/> <b:else/> <b:if cond='data:blog.searchQuery'> <title><data:blog.searchQuery/> - <data:blog.title/></title> <meta expr:content='data:blog.searchQuery + " - " + data:blog.title' itemprop='name'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.searchQuery + " - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:title'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.searchQuery + " - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:image:alt'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.searchQuery + " - " + data:blog.title' property='og:image:alt'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.searchQuery + " - " + data:blog.title' property='og:title'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.title' property='og:site_name'/> <!-- Keywords --> <meta expr:content='data:blog.searchQuery + ", " + data:blog.title' name='keywords'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.searchQuery + ", " + data:blog.title' property='article:tag'/> </b:if> <b:if cond='data:blog.pageName == ""'> <title>Produk - <data:blog.title/></title> <meta expr:content='"Produk - " + data:blog.title' itemprop='name'/> <meta expr:content='"Produk - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:title'/> <meta expr:content='"Produk - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:image:alt'/> <meta expr:content='"Produk - " + data:blog.title' property='og:image:alt'/> <meta expr:content='"Produk - " + data:blog.title' property='og:title'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.title' property='og:site_name'/> <!-- Keywords --> <meta expr:content='"Produk, " + data:blog.title' name='keywords'/> <meta expr:content='"Produk, " + data:blog.title' property='article:tag'/> </b:if> </b:if> <b:else/> <b:if cond='data:blog.pageType == "error_page"'> <title>Halaman tidak ditemukan! (404) - <data:blog.title/></title> <meta expr:content='"Halaman tidak ditemukan! (404) - " + data:blog.title' itemprop='name'/> <meta expr:content='"Halaman tidak ditemukan! (404) - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:title'/> <meta expr:content='"Halaman tidak ditemukan! (404) - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:image:alt'/> <meta expr:content='"Halaman tidak ditemukan! (404) - " + data:blog.title' property='og:image:alt'/> <meta expr:content='"Halaman tidak ditemukan! (404) - " + data:blog.title' property='og:title'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.title' property='og:site_name'/> <!-- Keywords --> <meta expr:content='"Halaman tidak ditemukan! (404), " + data:blog.title' name='keywords'/> <meta expr:content='"Halaman tidak ditemukan! (404), " + data:blog.title' property='article:tag'/> <b:else/> <b:if cond='data:blog.pageType == "item"'> <title><data:blog.pageName/> - <data:blog.title/></title> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' itemprop='name'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:title'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:image:alt'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' property='og:image:alt'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' property='og:title'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.title' property='og:site_name'/> <!-- Keywords --> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + ", " + data:blog.title' name='keywords'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + ", " + data:blog.title' property='article:tag'/> <b:else/> <b:if cond='data:blog.pageType == "static_page"'> <title><data:blog.pageName/> - <data:blog.title/></title> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' itemprop='name'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:title'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' name='twitter:image:alt'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' property='og:image:alt'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + " - " + data:blog.title' property='og:title'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.title' property='og:site_name'/> <!-- Keywords --> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + ", " + data:blog.title' name='keywords'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.pageName + ", " + data:blog.title' property='article:tag'/> </b:if> </b:if> </b:if> </b:if> </b:if>
<!-- Desc --> <meta expr:content='data:blog.metaDescription' name='description'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.metaDescription' name='twitter:description'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.metaDescription' itemprop='description'/>
<!-- IMG --> <b:if cond='data:blog.postImageUrl'> <link expr:href='resizeImage(data:blog.postImageUrl, 600, "2:1")' rel='image_src'/> <meta expr:content='resizeImage(data:blog.postImageUrl, 600, "2:1")' itemprop='image'/> <meta expr:content='resizeImage(data:blog.postImageUrl, 600, "2:1")' property='og:image'/> <meta content='600' property='og:image:width'/> <meta content='314' property='og:image:height'/> <meta expr:content='resizeImage(data:blog.postImageUrl, 600, "2:1")' name='twitter:image'/> <meta expr:content='resizeImage(data:blog.postImageUrl, 600, "2:1")' name='twitter:image:src'/> <b:else/> <link href='https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fommTN7vsd4/XcLiFSD_IsI/AAAAAAAABOA/bADMp9owzaI1QCHLtJnJzbKX31TfNTSNQCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/icon_template.png' rel='image_src'/> <meta content='https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fommTN7vsd4/XcLiFSD_IsI/AAAAAAAABOA/bADMp9owzaI1QCHLtJnJzbKX31TfNTSNQCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/icon_template.png' itemprop='image'/> <meta content='https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fommTN7vsd4/XcLiFSD_IsI/AAAAAAAABOA/bADMp9owzaI1QCHLtJnJzbKX31TfNTSNQCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/icon_template.png' property='og:image'/> <meta content='600' property='og:image:width'/> <meta content='314' property='og:image:height'/> <meta content='https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fommTN7vsd4/XcLiFSD_IsI/AAAAAAAABOA/bADMp9owzaI1QCHLtJnJzbKX31TfNTSNQCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/icon_template.png' name='twitter:image'/> <meta content='https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fommTN7vsd4/XcLiFSD_IsI/AAAAAAAABOA/bADMp9owzaI1QCHLtJnJzbKX31TfNTSNQCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/icon_template.png' name='twitter:image:src'/> </b:if> <!-- URL --> <link expr:href='data:blog.canonicalUrl' rel='canonical'/> <link expr:href='data:blog.canonicalUrl' hreflang='x-default' rel='alternate'/> <meta expr:content='data:blog.canonicalUrl' property='og:url'/>
<!-- AHC --> <meta content='index, follow' name='robots'/> <meta content='index, follow' name='googlebot'/> <meta content='notranslate' name='google'/> <meta content='IE=EmulateIE7' http-equiv='X-UA-Compatible'/> <meta content='width=device-width, initial-scale=1' name='viewport'/> <meta content='text/html; charset=UTF-8' http-equiv='Content-Type'/> <link expr:href='data:blog.homepageUrl + "favicon.ico"' rel='icon' type='image/x-icon'/> <link expr:href='data:blog.homepageUrl + "feeds/posts/default"' expr:title='data:blog.title + " - Atom"' rel='alternate' type='application/atom+xml'/> <link expr:href='data:blog.homepageUrl + "feeds/posts/default?alt=rss"' expr:title='data:blog.title + " - RSS"' rel='alternate' type='application/rss+xml'/> <link expr:href='"https://www.blogger.com/feeds/" + data:blog.blogId + "/posts/default"' expr:title='data:blog.title + " - Atom"' rel='service.post' type='application/atom+xml'/> <link href='//www.blogger.com/openid-server.g' rel='openid.server'/> <link expr:href='data:blog.homepageUrl' rel='openid.delegate'/> <!-- Icon Font --> <link href='https://unpkg.com/ionicons@4.5.10-0/dist/css/ionicons.min.css' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'/>
<meta content='data:skin.vars.keycolor' name='theme-color'/> <meta content='data:skin.vars.keycolor' name='msapplication-navbutton-color'/> <meta content='yes' name='apple-mobile-web-app-capable'/> <meta content='data:skin.vars.keycolor' name='apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style'/>
<b:skin version='1.0.0'><![CDATA[* ----------------------------------------------- Blogger Template Style Name : Minimalis WhatsApp Version : 1.0.0 (30/10/2019) Type : Premium Author : Rian SEO Designer: rianseo.com ----------------------------------------------- */
/* Variable definitions start ========================== <Variable name="keycolor" description="Main Color" type="color" default="#2FAD4A" value="#2FAD4A"/>
<Group description="Text Halaman" selector="body"> <Variable name="body.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 16px Work Sans, Arial, sans-serif" value="normal normal 16px Work Sans, Arial, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="body.text.color" description="Main Text Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> </Group>
<Group description="Theme Color" selector=".body-fauxcolumns-outer"> <Variable name="link.color" description="Link Color" type="color" default="#2FAD4A" value="#2FAD4A"/> <Variable name="link.visited.color" description="Link Visited Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="body.background.color" description="Body" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="header.background.color" description="Header" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="copy.footer" description="Copyright" type="color" default="#273443" value="#273443"/> <Variable name="b.footer" description="Footer" type="color" default="#232f3c" value="#232f3c"/> </Group>
<Variable name="body.background" description="Body Background" type="background" color="$(body.background.color)" default="$(color) none repeat scroll top left" value="$(color) none repeat scroll top left"/> <Variable name="body.background.override" description="Body Background Override" type="string" default="" value=""/>
<Group description="Menu Navigasi" selector="#cssmenu, .search-icon"> <Variable name="navmenu.font" description="Font" type="font" default="500 14px Work Sans, Arial, sans-serif" value="500 14px Work Sans, Arial, sans-serif"/> <Variable name="navmenu.font.color" description="Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> </Group>
<Group description="Slider Caraousel" selector="#slideHome"> <Variable name="owl.font.color" description="Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="owl.color" description="Background" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> </Group>
<Group description="Status Product" selector=".productPrice span, .productPhoto .slodout"> <Variable name="discon.color" description="Discon Background" type="color" default="#98d8ca" value="#98d8ca"/> <Variable name="slodout.color" description="Slod Out Background" type="color" default="#d3122a" value="#d3122a"/> </Group>
<Group description="Footer" selector="#footer-wrapper,#footer"> <Variable name="c.border" description="Background" type="color" default="#f6f6f6" value="#f6f6f6"/> <Variable name="footer.color" description="Color" type="color" default="rgba(255, 255, 255, .6)" value="rgba(255, 255, 255, .6)"/> <Variable name="footer.text.color" description="Link Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> </Group>
Variable definitions end ========================*/
/* Google Font */ @font-face{font-family:'Work Sans';font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:local('Work Sans'),local('WorkSans-Regular'),url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/worksans/v5/QGYsz_wNahGAdqQ43Rh_cqDpp_k.woff2) format('woff2');unicode-range:U+0100-024F,U+0259,U+1E00-1EFF,U+2020,U+20A0-20AB,U+20AD-20CF,U+2113,U+2C60-2C7F,U+A720-A7FF} @font-face{font-family:'Work Sans';font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:local('Work Sans'),local('WorkSans-Regular'),url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/worksans/v5/QGYsz_wNahGAdqQ43Rh_fKDp.woff2) format('woff2');unicode-range:U+0000-00FF,U+0131,U+0152-0153,U+02BB-02BC,U+02C6,U+02DA,U+02DC,U+2000-206F,U+2074,U+20AC,U+2122,U+2191,U+2193,U+2212,U+2215,U+FEFF,U+FFFD} @font-face{font-family:'Work Sans';font-style:normal;font-weight:500;src:local('Work Sans Medium'),local('WorkSans-Medium'),url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/worksans/v5/QGYpz_wNahGAdqQ43Rh3j4P8lthN2fk.woff2) format('woff2');unicode-range:U+0100-024F,U+0259,U+1E00-1EFF,U+2020,U+20A0-20AB,U+20AD-20CF,U+2113,U+2C60-2C7F,U+A720-A7FF} @font-face{font-family:'Work Sans';font-style:normal;font-weight:500;src:local('Work Sans Medium'),local('WorkSans-Medium'),url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/worksans/v5/QGYpz_wNahGAdqQ43Rh3j4P8mNhN.woff2) format('woff2');unicode-range:U+0000-00FF,U+0131,U+0152-0153,U+02BB-02BC,U+02C6,U+02DA,U+02DC,U+2000-206F,U+2074,U+20AC,U+2122,U+2191,U+2193,U+2212,U+2215,U+FEFF,U+FFFD} @font-face{font-family:'Work Sans';font-style:normal;font-weight:500;src:url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/stats/Work+Sans/normal/500);unicode-range:U+20} @font-face{font-family:'Work Sans';font-style:normal;font-weight:600;src:local('Work Sans SemiBold'),local('WorkSans-SemiBold'),url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/worksans/v5/QGYpz_wNahGAdqQ43Rh3o4T8lthN2fk.woff2) format('woff2');unicode-range:U+0100-024F,U+0259,U+1E00-1EFF,U+2020,U+20A0-20AB,U+20AD-20CF,U+2113,U+2C60-2C7F,U+A720-A7FF} @font-face{font-family:'Work Sans';font-style:normal;font-weight:600;src:local('Work Sans SemiBold'),local('WorkSans-SemiBold'),url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/worksans/v5/QGYpz_wNahGAdqQ43Rh3o4T8mNhN.woff2) format('woff2');unicode-range:U+0000-00FF,U+0131,U+0152-0153,U+02BB-02BC,U+02C6,U+02DA,U+02DC,U+2000-206F,U+2074,U+20AC,U+2122,U+2191,U+2193,U+2212,U+2215,U+FEFF,U+FFFD} @font-face{font-family:'Work Sans';font-style:normal;font-weight:700;src:local('Work Sans Bold'),local('WorkSans-Bold'),url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/worksans/v5/QGYpz_wNahGAdqQ43Rh3x4X8lthN2fk.woff2) format('woff2');unicode-range:U+0100-024F,U+0259,U+1E00-1EFF,U+2020,U+20A0-20AB,U+20AD-20CF,U+2113,U+2C60-2C7F,U+A720-A7FF} @font-face{font-family:'Work Sans';font-style:normal;font-weight:700;src:local('Work Sans Bold'),local('WorkSans-Bold'),url(https://fonts.gstatic.com/s/worksans/v5/QGYpz_wNahGAdqQ43Rh3x4X8mNhN.woff2) format('woff2');unicode-range:U+0000-00FF,U+0131,U+0152-0153,U+02BB-02BC,U+02C6,U+02DA,U+02DC,U+2000-206F,U+2074,U+20AC,U+2122,U+2191,U+2193,U+2212,U+2215,U+FEFF,U+FFFD}
/** * Eric Meyer's Reset CSS v2.0 http://meyerweb.com/eric/tools/css/reset/ * http://cssreset.com */ html,body,div,span,applet,object,iframe,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6,p,blockquote,pre,a,abbr,acronym,address,big,cite,code,del,dfn,em,img,ins,kbd,q,s,samp,small,strike,strong,sub,sup,tt,var,b,u,i,center,dl,dt,dd,ol,ul,li,fieldset,form,label,legend,table,caption,tbody,tfoot,thead,tr,th,td,article,aside,canvas,details,embed,figure,figcaption,footer,header,hgroup,menu,nav,output,ruby,section,summary,time,mark,audio,video{margin:0;padding:0;border:0;/*font-size:100%;*/font:inherit;vertical-align:baseline;} /* HTML5 display-role reset for older browsers */ article,aside,details,figcaption,figure,footer,header,hgroup,menu,nav,section{display:block;}body{line-height:1;display:block;}*{margin:0;padding:0;}html{display:block;} blockquote{background:#fff7e2;color:#8b6f32;margin:2em 0;padding:1em 1em;font-style:normal;font-size:12px;border:1px solid #e6b138;border-radius:2px} table{border-collapse:collapse;border-spacing:0;} input::-webkit-outer-spin-button,input::-webkit-inner-spin-button{-webkit-appearance:none;margin:0} input[type=number]{-moz-appearance:textfield} ::selection{background:rgba(0,0,0,.08);text-shadow:none} ::-webkit-selection{background:rgba(0,0,0,.08);text-shadow:none} ::-moz-selection{background:rgba(0,0,0,.08);text-shadow:none} a{cursor:pointer;text-decoration:none;color:$(link.color);} b{font-weight:600}img{max-width:100%;display:block} #navbar-iframe,.widget-item-control,a.quickedit,.home-link,.feed-links{display:none!important} br{clear:none!important} .clear,.hide{position:fixed!important;top:-99999999px!important;left:-99999999px!important;z-index:-9999!important;opacity:0!important;visibility:hidden!important} .clear:after{content:"";display:block;clear:both} h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{font-weight:500}i {font-style: italic;} table{border-collapse:collapse;border-spacing:0;width:100%;max-width:100%}table tr th{padding:15px 10px;text-align:center;letter-spacing:1px;font-size:18px;font-weight:600;text-transform:uppercase;line-height:1.4;vertical-align:middle}table tr td,table tr th{padding:8px 10px;border:0;text-align:left;border-bottom:1px solid $(c.border)} * { margin: 0; padding: 0; outline: none!important; box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-box-sizing: border-box; -moz-box-sizing: border-box; -ms-box-sizing: border-box; -o-box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word; -webkit-font-smoothing: subpixel-antialiased; }
.widget-item-control{display:none!important} .lazyload{background:#fff url(data:image/png;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAD/ACwAAAAAAQABAAACADs=) no-repeat center center!important;background-size:20px auto!important;transition:none!important} .mfp-arrow{position:fixed!important}.mfp-bg{background:rgba(0,0,0,.4)!important;opacity:1!important} .mfp-figure:after{box-shadow:0 20px 50px rgba(0,0,0,.2)!important;background:#EEF3FA!important} #loading:after{content:"";position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;width:26px;height:26px;margin:-15px 0 0 -15px;border:2px solid #ddd;border-left-color:$(link.color);border-right-color:#fff;border-radius:100%;animation:spinner .8s infinite linear;transform-origin:center} @-webkit-keyframes spinner{0%{-webkit-transform:rotate(0deg);transform:rotate(0deg)} to{-webkit-transform:rotate(1turn);transform:rotate(1turn)}} @keyframes spinner{0%{-webkit-transform:rotate(0deg);transform:rotate(0deg)} to{-webkit-transform:rotate(1turn);transform:rotate(1turn)}} #loading{display:none;position:fixed;z-index:1000;top:60px;background:#fff;box-shadow:0 100px 0 0 #fff;left:0;width:100%;height:calc(100% - 60px)}
.grid-wa{display:grid;grid-gap:10px} .grid-wa.col2{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr} .grid-wa.col3{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr} .grid-wa.col4{grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr} .grid-wa.col2-submit{grid-template-columns:1fr} .grid-wa.install-btn{grid-template-columns:2fr 1fr}
/* BODY */ body {background: $(body.background);margin:0;padding:0;color: $(body.text.color);font: $(body.font);text-align: left;}
/* HEADER */ #headerArea {background: $(header.background.color);color:#000;position: fixed;top: 0;left: 0;right: 0;width: 100%;border-bottom:1px solid #f6f6f6;z-index: 999;height:70px} #headerArea.sticky{border:0;-webkit-box-shadow:0 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);box-shadow:0 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);-webkit-transition:.3s;-o-transition:.3s;transition:.3s} #header-wrapper {box-sizing: border-box;max-width:1024px;margin: 0 auto;padding:0;position: relative;} .header {max-width: 400px;float: left;margin-right: 28px;overflow: hidden;white-space: nowrap;text-overflow: ellipsis;} .header .toko-title, .header p.title {font-size:24px;color:$(navmenu.font.color);margin: 0;padding:20px 0;font-weight:500} .header .description {color: $(link.color);margin: -10px 0 4px 0;padding: 0;font-size: 0.7em;display: none;} .header a, .header a:hover {color: $(link.color);} .header img {display:block;width: auto;margin: 8px 0;max-height: 32px;}
/* WRAPPER */ .wrapper {margin:0 auto;padding:30px 0;width:1025px;max-width:calc(100% - 20px);} .post-wrapper {padding:70px 0 0;width:100%;max-width:1025px;margin:0 auto;}
/* TITLE PRODUK */ .daftarProduk, .relatedProduk{position:relative;text-align:center;margin-bottom:30px} .daftarProduk h1, .relatedProduk h3{display:inline-block;margin:0;text-transform:uppercase;font-size:16px;background:#fff;color:$(navmenu.font.color);z-index:1;position:relative;padding:4px 16px;font-weight:500;border:2px solid $(c.border);border-radius:15px} .daftarProduk:before, .relatedProduk:before{z-index:1;content:"";width:100%;height:2px;position:absolute;top:50%;left:0;margin-top:-1px;background:$(c.border)} .productPrice span{position:absolute;top:10px;left:10px;background:$(discon.color);color:#fff;width:40px;height:40px;line-height:40px;border-radius:40px;text-align:center;font-weight:600;font-size:90%}
/* BREADCRUMS */ .breadcrumbs{width:100%;display:block;text-align:left;margin:20px 0 0;padding:10px 0;font-size:90%;border-radius:2px;white-space:nowrap;overflow-x:auto} .breadcrumbs *{display:inline-block;vertical-align:baseline} .breadcrumbs i{color:rgba(0,0,0,.2);margin:0 5px}
.wrapper404 {margin:auto;padding:70px 0 0;width:100%;max-width:1025px} #halaman404{display:flex;min-height:calc(100vh - 60px);text-align:center} #halaman404 h1{font-size:500%;color:$(body.text.color)} #halaman404 h1 span{-webkit-animation:indicator .8s ease infinite!important;-moz-animation:indicator .8s ease infinite!important;animation:indicator .8s ease infinite!important;font-weight:700;display:inline-block;vertical-align:top} #halaman404 small{color:rgba(0,0,0,.6)}
/* PRODUCT POST */ .productPrice {font-size:110%;color:$(link.color);} .productBody .productPostBody .productTitle {font-weight:400;display:block;margin:10px 0 5px;font-size:100%;} .productBody .productPostBody .productTitle a {color:$(link.visited.color);} .productBody .productPostBody .productTitle a:hover {color:$(link.color);} .productPhoto .slodout{direction:ltr;display:block;width:100px;height:80px;overflow:hidden;position:absolute;z-index:5;top:0;left:10px;cursor:pointer} .productPhoto .slodout .text{border-radius:25px;text-transform:uppercase;display:block;font-size:75%;font-weight:600;letter-spacing:2px;text-align:center;position:relative;padding:7px 0;top:15px;background:$(slodout.color);color:#fff;}
/* PAGE NAVIGASI */ .blog-pager {float:left;width:100%;} .displaypageNum a,.showpage a,.pagecurrent{padding:5px 20px;border-radius:2px;margin:10px 5px;white-space:nowrap;display:inline-block;transition:.1s} .displaypageNum a,.showpage a{background:transparent} .displaypageNum a:hover,.showpage a:hover,.pagecurrent{background:rgba(0,0,0,.04)} .displaypageNum a:active,.showpage a:active{background:rgba(0,0,0,.08)} .showpageOf{display:none!important} #blog-pager .showpage,#blog-pager .pagecurrent{font-weight:500}
/* SEARCH FORM */ .search-icon {position: absolute;top:21px;right: 0;font-size:23px;} .search-icon a {color:$(navmenu.font.color);} .search-icon svg {width:25px;height:25px;fill: currentColor;} #searchItem{position: fixed;z-index:9999;top: 0px;left: 0px;width: 100%;height: 100vh;background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);-webkit-transition: all 0.1s ease-in-out;-moz-transition: all 0.1s ease-in-out;-o-transition: all 0.1s ease-in-out;-ms-transition: all 0.1s ease-in-out;transition: all 0.1s ease-in-out;opacity: 0;-webkit-transform: translate(0px,-100%) scale(0,0);-moz-transform: translate(0px,-100%) scale(0,0);-o-transform: translate(0px,-100%) scale(0,0);-ms transform: translate(0px,-100%) scale(0,0);transform: translate(0px,-100%) scale(0,0);} #searchItem.open{-webkit-transform:translate(0px,0px) scale(1,1);-moz-transform:translate(0px,0px) scale(1,1);-o-transform:translate(0px,0px) scale(1,1);-ms-transform:translate(0px,0px) scale(1,1);transform:translate(0px,0px) scale(1,1);opacity:1;z-index:9999} #searchItem input[type="search"]{position:absolute;top:50%;left:0;margin-top:-51px;width:70%;margin-left:15%;color:$(navmenu.font.color);background:transparent;border-top:0;border-bottom:2px solid rgba(255,255,255,.5);border-left:0 solid transparent;border-right:0 solid transparent;font-size:40px;text-align:center;outline:0;padding:10px} #searchItem .close{position:fixed;top:20px;right:30px;color:$(navmenu.font.color);background-color:transparent;font-size:56px;border:0;outline:0} #searchfs .close:hover {cursor:pointer;outline:none;}
/* NAV MENU */ #cssmenu,#cssmenu ul,#cssmenu ul li,#cssmenu ul li a,#cssmenu #head-mobile{border:0;list-style:none;line-height:1;display:block;-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;-moz-box-sizing:border-box;box-sizing:border-box} #cssmenu ul li{float:left;margin:0} #cssmenu ul li a{position:relative;padding:0 17px;font:$(navmenu.font);line-height:70px;letter-spacing:.8px;text-decoration:none;text-transform:none;color:$(navmenu.font.color)} #cssmenu #head-mobile{position:relative} #cssmenu{text-align:left} #cssmenu ul{margin:0;display:block;height:70px} #cssmenu #head-mobile{display:none;position:relative} #cssmenu ul li:hover a,#cssmenu ul li.active a{color:$(link.color)} #cssmenu ul li.active:hover,#cssmenu ul li.active,#cssmenu ul li.has-sub.active:hover{background:rgba(64,64,64,0.1);-webkit-transition:background .2s ease;-ms-transition:background .2s ease;transition:background .2s ease} #cssmenu ul ul li:last-child>a,#cssmenu ul ul li.last-item>a{border-bottom:0} #cssmenu ul ul li.has-sub:hover,#cssmenu ul li.has-sub ul li.has-sub ul li:hover{background:#efefef} .hiddenMenu {display:none;}
/* COLOR */ .productOption li#coklat,.productOption li#biru,.productOption li#merah,.productOption li#hitam,.productOption li#hijau,.productOption li#kuning,.productOption li#putih,.productOption li#ungo, .productOption li#gold, .productOption li#gray {border:0;display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle;height:26px;width:26px;font-size:0;margin:0 10px 0 0;padding:0;border-radius:50%}
.productOption li.selected#coklat,.productOption li.selected#biru, .productOption li.selected#merah, .productOption li.selected#hitam, .productOption li.selected#hijau, .productOption li.selected#kuning, .productOption li.selected#putih, .productOption li.selected#ungo, .productOption li.selected#gold, .productOption li.selected#gray {box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px #ffffff, 0 0 0 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);} .productOption li#coklat {background:#795548} .productOption li#biru {background:#2196F3} .productOption li#gold {background:#ffd700} .productOption li#gray {background:#808080} .productOption li#ungo {background:#6002ee} .productOption li#merah {background:#ff0000} .productOption li#putih {background:#ffffff} .productOption li#hitam {background:#000000} .productOption li#kuning {background:#ffff00} .productOption li#hijau {background:#008000} .productOption li#coklat:hover,.productOption li#biru:hover, .productOption li#merah:hover, .productOption li#hitam:hover, .productOption li#hijau:hover, .productOption li#kuning:hover, .productOption li#putih:hover ,.productOption li#ungo:hover, .productOption li#gold:hover, .productOption li#gray:hover{-webkit-box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px #ffffff, 0 0 0 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);box-shadow: 0 0 0 2px #ffffff, 0 0 0 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);outline: none;}
/* PAYMENT */ .customPayment {padding:10px 0 0 0;} .customPayment > div > p {font-size:16px;font-weight:500} .customPayment .optionPayment {margin:15px 0} .customPayment .optionPayment li{list-style:none;display:inline-block;width:72px;height:36px;background-position:center center;background-size:70% auto;background-repeat:no-repeat;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.06);margin:3px 2px;padding:.2em}
@media screen and (max-width:800px){ .post-wrapper {padding:70px 15px 15px;} #cssmenu {float: none;} #cssmenu #head-mobile {display:block;padding:30px;font-size:12px;} #cssmenu .LinkList{display:none;background:$(header.background.color);position:fixed!important;position:relative;z-index:+1000;top:0;left:0;right:auto;height:100%;width:284px} #cssmenu ul{width:100%;display:block;height:auto} #cssmenu ul li a {line-height:60px;} .hiddenMenu{display:block;position:fixed;top:10px;right:10%;color:#ddd;font-size:30px;border:0;outline:0!important;cursor:pointer;} .button{width:25px;height:20px;position:absolute;right:0;top:20px;cursor:pointer;z-index:2;outline:0} .toko1,.toko2,.toko3{position:absolute;left:0;display:block;height:2px;width:22px;background:$(navmenu.font.color);content:'';border-radius:5px;transition:all .2s} .toko1 {top: 2px;} .toko2 {top: 8px;} .toko3 {top: 14px;} .closeItem{position:fixed;z-index:1;display:block;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100vh;opacity:.7;background:#000}}
/* Window */ .popWindow{font-size:14px;line-height:1.6} .popWindow{display:flex!important;position:relative;position:fixed!important;z-index:+1000;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;overflow-y:auto;padding:10px 0;visibility:hidden;opacity:0} .popWindow.open{visibility:visible;opacity:1;transition:.2s} .popWindow a{text-decoration:none} .popWindow .wrap{display:block;margin:auto auto;width:calc(100% - 20px);box-shadow:0 20px 50px rgba(0,0,0,.2);max-width:500px} .popWindow .wrap .title{display:grid;width:100%;grid-template-columns:1fr auto;grid-column-gap:10px;margin:0;height:60px;line-height:60px;border-bottom:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.06);font-size:14px;background:#fff;font-weight:400;border-radius:2px 2px 0 0} .popWindow .wrap .title span.title-content{padding:0 20px;display:block;vertical-align:middle;white-space:nowrap;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;color:#444;font-size:110%} .popWindow .wrap .title span.title-content i{color:$(link.color);font-size:140%;display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle;margin-right:10px} .popWindow .wrap .title .closeWindow{display:block;color:#aaa;padding:0 20px;cursor:pointer;font-size:30px;font-weight:300;transition:.2s} .popWindow .wrap .title .closeWindow:hover{color:#444} .popWindow .wrap .title .closeWindow:before{content:"";cursor:default;display:block;position:fixed;z-index:-2;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:calc(100% + 100px);background:rgba(0,0,0,.4);visibility:hidden;opacity:0} .popWindow.open .wrap .title .closeWindow:before{visibility:visible;opacity:1;transition:.4s} .popWindow .wrap .content{display:block;background:#fff;border-radius:0 0 2px 2px} .popWindow .popWindow-wrap{padding:20px} .productCheckoutInfo{display:grid;grid-template-columns:auto 1fr;grid-gap:30px;padding:20px;width:calc(100% + 40px);margin-left:-20px;margin-top:-20px;border-bottom:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.06)} .productCheckoutInfo .img img{border-radius:2px} .productCheckoutInfo .total{color:$(link.color)} .productCheckoutInfo .ongkir{opacity:.8;font-size:70%} .productCheckoutInfo .waText{display:inline-block;opacity:0;text-indent:-9999px} .productOptionInfo{margin-top:10px;display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;grid-column-gap:5px}
.footer-wrapper{border-top:1px solid $(c.border);float:left;width:100%;display:block;padding:60px 0;color:rgba(0,0,0,.6)} .footer-wrapper .grid{display:grid;padding:0;grid-template-columns:repeat(3,1fr);grid-column-gap:40px} .footer-wrapper .grid .widget{display:block;} .footer-wrapper .grid .widget:nth-last-child(1){border-right:0;padding-right:0} .footer-wrapper .grid .widget .icon,.footer-wrapper .grid .widget .text{display:flex} .footer-wrapper .grid .widget .icon i,.footer-wrapper .grid .widget .text .textWrap{text-align:center;display:block;margin:auto} .footer-wrapper .grid .widget .icon i{color:$(footer.text.color);margin-top:0;background:$(link.color);width:60px;height:60px;line-height:60px;border-radius:60px;text-align:center;font-size:25px;transition:.1s} .footer-wrapper .grid .widget:hover .icon i{font-size:30px;} .footer-wrapper .grid .widget .text{margin-top:15px;} .footer-wrapper .grid .widget .text h4{position:relative;font-size:120%;margin-bottom:20px;font-weight:600;color:rgba(0,0,0,.8)} .footer-wrapper .grid .widget .text small{color:rgba(0,0,0,.6)}
.footerCopyright{background:$(copy.footer)} .footerCopyright .copyrightFooter{color:$(footer.text.color);padding:40px 0;font-size:95%;display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr;grid-gap:40px;text-align:center} .footerCopyright .copyrightFooter .widget h3{display:block;margin-bottom:30px;font-weight:600;color:$(footer.color)} .footerCopyright .copyrightFooter .widget .btnGroup{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr;grid-gap:10px} .footerCopyright .copyrightFooter .widget .btnGroup a:nth-last-child(1){grid-column:1 / 3;font-size:90%} .footerCopyright .copyrightFooter .widget .btnGroup a{display:block;background:#fff;color:rgba(0,0,0,.6);font-weight:600;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.06);border-radius:100px;padding:5px 15px;text-align:center} .footertCopyright .copyrightFooter .widget .btnGroup a i{display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle;color:#009688;margin-right:5px;font-size:160%} .footerCopyright .copyrightFooter .widget .pengirimanSupport li{display:inline-block;height:36px;width:72px;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.06);margin:3px 2px;background-color:#fff;border-radius:2px;background-position:center center;background-size:70% auto;background-repeat:no-repeat} .footerCopyright .copyRight{background:$(b.footer);padding:20px 0;font-size:80%;color:rgba(255, 255, 255, .6)} .footerCopyright .copyRight a {color:$(footer.text.color);} .footerCopyright .copyRight .grid{padding:0;display:grid;grid-template-columns:auto 1fr;grid-gap:20px} .footerCopyright .copyRight .widget-content {float:right;margin-left:10px} .footerCopyright .copyRight ul{margin-left:20px} .footerCopyright .copyRight ul,.widgetCopyright .copyRight ul *{display:inline-block;vertical-align:baseline;line-height:0} .footerCopyright .copyRight ul li:after{content:"";display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle;font-size:90%;opacity:.2;margin:0 10px} .footerCopyright .copyRight ul li:last-child:after{display:none} .svg-icon-24 {display:none} .widget.Attribution svg {fill:rgba(255, 255, 255, .6)} .Attribution .blogger img, .Attribution .blogger svg {vertical-align:middle;} .widget.Attribution .blogger, .widget.Attribution .copyright {display:inline-block}
/* FOOTER */ #footer {float:left;width:100%;} .contact-item.item-0{margin:0} .contact-item{text-align:left;display:block;overflow:hidden;font-size:14px;line-height:30px;margin:15px 0 0} .contact-icon{float:left;width:30px;height:30px;background-color:$(link.color);font-size:18px;color:$(footer.text.color);line-height:30px;text-align:center;margin:0 10px 0 0;border-radius:3px}
/* POST PRODUK */ .productPhoto {position:relative;} .productPhotoWrapper a{display:block;width:100%;padding-top:100%;background-size:cover;background-position:center center;cursor:crosshair;background-repeat:no-repeat} .productOption{display:block;margin-bottom:20px} .productOption small{font-size:16px;font-weight:500;display:inline-block;margin:0 20px 10px 0} .productOption li{display:inline-block;padding:5px 15px;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.06);font-size:90%;text-decoration:none;margin-right:5px;margin-bottom:5px;border-radius:2px;cursor:pointer} .productOption li:active{background:#fafafa} .productOption li.selected{background-color:$(link.color);color:#fff}
/* CHECK OUT */ .productCheckout{position:relative} .productQty{display:block;position: relative;margin:0 0 20px 0;} .productQty .shopProduct-title {padding:0 20px 0 0} .productQty .shopProduct-button {border-bottom: 2px solid #ccc!important;padding: 0 0 10px 0;margin: 0 10px 0 30px;} .productQty .shopProduct-title, .productQty .shopProduct-button {font-weight:500;height:auto;line-height:40px;border:0;text-align:left} .productCheckout .stock{display:flex;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;background:rgba(255,255,255,.8);color:$(link.color);text-align:center;letter-spacing:2px} .productCheckout .stock div{display:block;margin:auto;opacity:0}
/*SHARE */ .shareWrapper, .customPayment{display:block;position:relative} .shareProduk, .shareIcon, .optionPayment img {display:inline-block} .shareIcon a{position:relative;display:inline-block;margin:0 3px 7px;height:40px;width:40px;font-size:20px;vertical-align:middle;border-radius:50%;cursor:pointer;line-height:40px;font-weight:400;text-align:center;box-sizing:border-box;opacity:1;padding:0;transition:all .17s ease;} .shareIcon a:hover{opacity:0.9} .shareIconr a i {display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle;font-size:110%} .shareIcon a:hover i{transform:scale(1.1)} .shareIcon a i {color:#ffffff;} .shareIcon .whatsapp{background:#25d366} .shareIcon .pinterest {background:#BD081B} .shareIcon .facebook{background:#4267b2} .shareIcon .twitter{background:#1da1f2}
/* TAB */ .productTab{display:block;margin-top:20px} .productTab .tabNav ul{margin:0;display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr} .productTab .tabNav ul li{display:block;text-align:center;padding:10px;border-bottom:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.08);cursor:pointer} .productTab .tabNav ul li.selected{border-bottom:3px solid $(link.color)} .productTab .tabContent{display:none;padding:20px 0} .productTab .tabContent.selected{display:block} .detailDescription, .detailInformasi{display:block} .detailDescription ul,.detailDescription ol, .detailInformasi ul, .detailInformasi ol{display:block;margin-left:20px}
/* OPTION */ .productQty *{display:inline-block;height:40px;line-height:40px;border:1px solid $(c.border);vertical-align:middle;text-align:center} .productQty button{border:0;font-weight:500;cursor:pointer;background:transparent;font-size:20px} .productQty button:active{background:rgba(0,0,0,.08)} .productQty input{width:80px;text-align:center;padding:0 15px;vertical-align:middle;border:none;font-size:16px;} .productOrder {margin:0 0 20px 0;text-transform:uppercase;} .productOrder a{font-size:1em;font-weight:500;padding:1em 2em;display:block;line-height:1;border:0;vertical-align:middle;text-align:center;background:$(link.color);color:#fff;width:262px;} .productOrder a:hover{background-color:#333333} .productOrder a i{display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle;font-size:150%;margin-right:10px} .productRelated{background:#fff;padding:0} .productRelated iframe#relatedFrame{display:block;width:100%;overflow-y:hidden!important;border:0;visibility:visible;height:353.42px;}
.owl-carousel .statusPromo {width:400px;position:absolute;top:40%;left:auto;right:10%;-webkit-transform:translateY(-40%);transform:translateY(-40%);} .owl-carousel .statusPromo .title {font-size:16px;color:$(link.color);text-transform:uppercase;} .owl-carousel .shopNow {font-size:56px;color:$(owl.font.color);line-height:71px;font-weight:500;position:relative;} .owl-theme .owl-dots .owl-dot span,.owl-theme .owl-dots .owl-dot:hover span{background:$(owl.color)!important} .owl-theme .owl-dots .owl-dot.active span{width:10px!important;height:10px!important;transition:.1s!important} .owl-theme .owl-dots .owl-dot.active span,.owl-theme .owl-dots .owl-dot:active span{background:$(owl.font.color)!important} .owl-carousel{position:relative!important} .owl-dots{position:absolute!important;bottom:5%!important;left:calc(50% - 75px)!important;width:150px!important;text-align:center!important} .owl-nav{display:block!important} .owl-carousel .owl-nav button.owl-prev,.owl-carousel .owl-nav button.owl-next{position:absolute;top:50%;background:$(owl.color)!important;-webkit-transform:translateY(-50%);transform:translateY(-50%);width:50px;height:50px;text-align:center;line-height:51px;color:$(owl.font.color)!important;left:15px;-webkit-transition:.3s;transition:.3s;font-size:200%!important} .owl-carousel .owl-nav button.owl-next{left:auto;right:15px} .owl-carousel .owl-nav button.owl-next:hover,.owl-carousel .owl-nav button.owl-prev:hover{background:$(owl.font.color)!important;opacity:1;color:$(owl.color)!important} #slideHome{padding:70px 0 30px 0} #slideHome .owl-carousel{border-radius:2px;overflow:hidden}
.liveChat {font-family:Montserrat,sans-serif;position:relative;position:fixed!important;z-index:10;bottom:20px} .liveChat.kiri{left:20px} .liveChat.kanan{right:20px} .liveChat i.wa{position:relative;display:block;width:60px;height:60px;line-height:60px;text-align:center;background:#fff;color:$(link.color);border-radius:60px;box-shadow:0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,.08);font-size:30px} .liveChat:active i.wa{box-shadow:none} .liveChat span.count{position:absolute;display:inline-block;top:-2px;right:-2px;background:#fed859;color:rgba(0,0,0,.8);height:20px;line-height:20px;width:20px;border-radius:20px;font-size:8px;text-align:center;font-style:normal;font-weight:600;box-shadow:inset 0 -3px 0 rgba(0,0,0,.08);transform:scale(0.0)} .liveChat.show span.count{transform:scale(1.1);transition:.2s} .liveChat span.info{display:inline-block;white-space:nowrap;border-radius:4px;background:#fff;height:40px;line-height:40px;padding:0 15px;text-align:center;position:relative;position:absolute!important;box-shadow:0 5px 15px rgba(0,0,0,.08);bottom:8px;color:rgba(0,0,0,.6);opacity:0;visibility:hidden} .liveChat.show span.info{opacity:1;visibility:visible;transition:1s} .liveChat.kiri span.info{left:calc(100% + 45px)} .liveChat.kiri.show span.info{left:calc(100% + 15px)} .liveChat.kanan span.info{right:calc(100% + 45px)} .liveChat.kanan.show span.info{right:calc(100% + 15px)} .liveChat span.info:after{position:absolute;top:calc(50% - 8px);content:""border:8px solid} .liveChat.kiri span.info:after{right:100%;border-color:transparent #fff transparent transparent} .liveChat.kanan span.info:after{left:100%;border-color:transparent transparent transparent #fff} .liveChat span.info i{display:inline-block;font-size:140%;margin-right:5px;vertical-align:middle;color:#4fc3f7}
@media only screen and (max-width:1080px){ #slideHome .owl-carousel {width:100%!important;margin:0!important;} .footer-wrapper{padding:0} .footer-wrapper .grid{grid-gap:40px;font-size:90%;width:100%;max-width:calc(100% + 20px);grid-template-columns:repeat(3,60%) 1px;overflow-x:auto;padding:40px 10px;padding-left:30px} .footer-wrapper .grid:after{content:"";display:block} .footer-wrapper .grid .widget{display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr;grid-column-gap:0;grid-row-gap:10px;text-align:center} .footer-wrapper .grid .widget .icon,.footer-wrapper .grid .widget .text{display:block}} @media only screen and (max-width:800px){ #headerArea {height:60px;} #header-wrapper {padding:0;position: relative;max-width:100%;} .header .toko-title, .header p.title {padding:16px 0;} .owl-carousel .statusPromo {display:none;} .footerCopyright .copyRight .grid .widget, .footerCopyright .copyRight .widget-content {text-align:center;margin:0} #slideHome {padding:60px 0 0!important;} .breadcrumbs {margin:0;font-size:12px;} .productBody .productPostBody >.productDetail .productTitle {margin-top:20px!important;} #cssmenu ul {max-height:calc(100vh - 48px);overflow-y: auto;} #cssmenu ul li {float:none;} .button {left: 20px;} .header{position:absolute;top:0;left:60px;right:60px;z-index:1;text-align:center;float:none;display:inline-block;max-width:100%;margin-right:0} .header img {display: inline-block !important;} .search-icon {right: 20px;top:15px;} .footer-wrapper .grid {grid-template-columns: repeat(3,30%) 1px;overflow-x: auto;padding: 40px 10px;} .footerCopyright .copyrightFooter {padding: 40px 20px;font-size: 95%;display: grid;grid-template-columns:1fr 1fr 1fr;grid-gap: 40px;}}

$(this).find('li').click(function(){ var id = $(this).parents('.productOption').attr('id'); var value = $(this).text(); $(this).parents('.productOption').find('li').removeAttr('class'); $(this).addClass('selected'); $(this).parents('.productOption').attr('data-selected',value); $('.productOptionInfo .val-'+id).find('b').text(value); }); $(this).find('li:first').trigger('click');
var detail = $(this).attr('data-detail'); if(detail != null && detail != '') { var detailResize = detail.replace("h120","s800"); $(this).find('small').append(' (  <a class="lightbox" title="Detail '+id+' - '+postTitle+'" href="'+detailResize+'"><i class="icon ion-md-search" style="font-size:140%;display:inline-block;vertical-align:middle;"></i>  Lihat Detail</a>  )'); } }); /* Append -------------------------------------------------------------------- */

function getHostName(url) { var match = url.match(/:\/\/(www[0-9]?\.)?(.[^/:]+)/i); if (match != null && match.length > 2 && typeof match[2] === 'string' && match[2].length > 0) { return match[2]; } else { return null; } }
function toTitleCase(str) { return str.replace( /\w\S*/g, function(txt) { return txt.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + txt.substr(1).toLowerCase(); } ); }
/* TAB --------------------------------------------------------------- */ $('.productTab').appendTo('.postBody'); $('.detailDescription').appendTo('#tabDescription'); $('.productLabel').appendTo('#tabDescription'); $('.detailInformasi').appendTo('#tabInformasi');
var stock = $('.productDetail').data('stock'); if(stock === 'off') { $('.productCheckout').append('<div style="cursor:not-allowed;" onclick="alert(''+set_toko.stock_habis+'');" class="stock" title="'+set_toko.stock_habis+'"></div>'); }
/* Qty -------------------------------------------------------------------- */
$('<small><span class="waText">*</span>Qty<span class="waText">*</span></small><small class="val-Ukuran"> : <b class="qty"></b><span class="waText">%0A</span></small>').appendTo('.productOptionInfo');
function totalPrice(q) { var realPrice = $('.productPrice').attr('data-selected'), priceTotal = realPrice * q; $('.productCheckoutInfo').find('.total').text(angkaToRp(priceTotal)); $('.productCheckoutInfo').find('.total').text(angkaToRp(priceTotal)); $('.productCheckoutInfo').find('.satuan').text(set_toko.satuan); $('.productOptionInfo').find('.qty').text(q); } var realPrice = $('.productPrice').attr('data-selected'), priceTotal = realPrice * 1;
$(document).ready(function(){ totalPrice(1); });
$('.productQty input').on('keyup', function(){ var value = parseInt($('.productQty input').val()); if(value <= 1) { $('.productQty input').val(1); totalPrice(1); } $(this).parents('.productQty').attr('data-selected',value); totalPrice(value);
}); $('.productQty .min').on('click', function(){ var value = parseInt($('.productQty input').val()) - 1; if(value <= 1) { $('.productQty input').val(1); $(this).parents('.productQty').attr('data-selected',1); totalPrice(1);
} else { $('.productQty input').val(value); $(this).parents('.productQty').attr('data-selected',value); totalPrice(value);
} }); $('.productQty .plus').on('click', function(){ var value = parseInt($('.productQty input').val()) + 1; $('.productQty input').val(value); $(this).parents('.productQty').attr('data-selected',value); totalPrice(value); }); if($('.productPrice').val() == null) { $('.productCheckoutInfo hr, .productCheckoutInfo .totalqty, .productCheckoutInfo .ongkir').remove(); } /* Tab -------------------------------------------------------------------- */
$('.tabNav ul li').on('click', function(){ var id = $(this).data('tab');
$('.tabNav ul li').removeClass('selected'); $(this).addClass('selected'); $('.tabContent').hide(); $('.tabContent#'+id).fadeIn(); }); /* jspost */ //]]> </script> </b:if> </b:if>

entry.title: Cara Belanja
entry.content:
Halaman ini akan memberikan Anda arahan, untuk bisa membeli hijab yang Anda inginkan di toko online kami ini.

Pilih Produk Hijab yang Kamu Inginkan


Klik nama hijab/barang yang ingin Anda beli.


Setelah Terbuka, Klik tombol beli


  • Via WhatsApp - +628784172384
  • Via SMS - +6285886594023
  • Via Email - hanyates@hijab.com
Nanti akan mendapatkan responds atau balasan dari Pihak kami.

Apabila transaksi sudah selesai, maka barang pesanan Anda akan segera kami kirim lewat daftar pengiriman yang mendukung di halaman toko kami.
